comments.html: Shouldn't this be a bug (and potential DoS security issue) to be filed with TAC, rather than just a "caveat" to be documented?
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: Well, the configuration that permits outside addresses in the inside access-list or route-map has been unsupported "forever" (see the comments to the related post), it's just that with 12.4T we're gettting hit with the consequences of using unsupported configuration.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
